website_summaries.verdict: A grippy neutral trail shoe for the minimalist runner.
pros: A super flexible shoe with minimal cushioning for a lightweight feel
Shoe features a Vibram brand outsole that provides exceptional traction
cons: Upper is stretchy but most reviewers felt the need to size up regardless

customer_reviews.title: Order 1/2 size up
customer_reviews.text: I agree with many other reviews, order 1/2 size up. Look at my picture, I have experience with these shoes (that isn't all of them). I have always worn a size 9 in all NB Minimus shoes and find no other shoe compares. However, these are too small, length wise. The gray/orange pair have been my faves and they are most like this new model. Some reviewers say the band across the top was too tight. I don't think it is-just the length. Hope this helps. I'm exchanging for a 9.5. Only gave 4 stars because of this - otherwise I love Minimus shoes!
customer_reviews.author: Deanna B.

customer_reviews.title: but when I saw these I fell in love with the look
customer_reviews.text: So it was either these or five fingered shoes...but when I saw these I fell in love with the look! I bought a half size up so they fit perfectly. I'm normally a 7 and bought a 7 1/2. These shoes are minimalist shoes so if you are the kind of person who needs support in a shoe do to foot injury or do to a foot condition I do not recommend these shoes for you. If you want a more natural feel when you run or walk, that's what you will receive in this shoe. They will take a while to get used to so take it easy at first and do short runs. well that's all I got.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best Minimal Shoe
customer_reviews.text: I am a running shoe SNOB. With that said, this is my 5th pair of NB minimus. I LOVED the 2013 model & cried when I couldn't find them to buy again. I begrudgenly bought this pair & am so very happy I did! I run off road, sometimes trails but hardly ever straight-up concrete. I have a medium to high arch & am smack dab in the middle of size 7 & 7.5. I bought these in 7.5 & they fit perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Renee

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THESE
customer_reviews.text: My favorite type of shoe for barefoot running, walking, coaching T-ball, traveling you name it. My last pair I had for over 5 years - finally bought a new pair of these New balance minimals because my old pair had a hole in the bottom (just worn down after running over a thousand miles in several years!) Great, strong, long-lasting shoe - very comfortable. Just note - no arch support OR cushioning in these. But its great for your ankles - builds strength - to not have all that cushion.
customer_reviews.author: Ann L. Woodard

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING!
customer_reviews.text: These are my first "barefoot" shoes. I've had 4mm drops before, but I wanted to go lower. I originally ordered the regular B width because I have never had to buy a wide shoe. When I tried them on, that hard rubber part that goes over your foot was really tight. So I exchanged them for a wide (D) and they fit PERFECTLY! I LOVE these shoes! Running in them is amazing! They fit your foot like a glove. So lightweight, and you really feel the ground beneath your feet. It truly feels like you aren't wearing shoes!
customer_reviews.author: Kerri M.

customer_reviews.title: Love this shoe
customer_reviews.text: I've been wearing the men's version of the Minimus shoe for two marathons and training in between. I was delighted to find my size in the women's style (according to the sizes available at the running stores, only women with small feet run in Chicago). They are much more snug on my feet and require thin socks compared to wearing the men's style. I love them and will keep buying them as long as NB makes them! They are way better than the Merrels I bought to replace my first pair of Minimus.
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: Slight design change?
customer_reviews.text: This is my 3rd pair of NB Minimus, and these are the 1st pair I'm unhappy with. There must have been some change to their design (though nothing visibly obvious) as they just don'tfit the same as my past 2 pairs. I had ordered a half size larger than my past pairs, but these fit SMALLER than my old ones. I thought maybe they just needed wearing in, but they are still uncomfortable. (And now, since I've worn them are no longer returnable...) Such a bummer, the previous pairs were my favorite shoes ever!
customer_reviews.author: scubagirlwonder

customer_reviews.title: Runs small, perfect for those with smaller feet
customer_reviews.text: I am usually a kids size 2 or women’s 4 so for me to buy this in a 5.5 for it to fit, says that these run small. I’ve had a pair previously in a 5.5, so I went ahead and bought these in a 5.5. Fits snugly and I love the colors and fit! A 5 in most brands tend to be large on me. I can fit a 5 in Nike. But when it comes to dress shoes, only 4 or 4.5 in women’s will fit correctly. Hope that helps
customer_reviews.author: STP

customer_reviews.title: Sizes run way small
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to like these shoes, I have the old version and still wear. I ordered a 1/2 size up and wide and tried to wear them most of the day. Waaaay too tight and small. I normally wear 7 1/2 m. I ordered a 8 d. How can they be that much off! I did not order another size, too disappointed:(
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Best lightweight, low profile athletic shoes EVER.  Tempted to stockpile.
customer_reviews.text: I adore these shoes and have them in two colors. I've never had shoes before that were so light weight/low profile and yet functionally supportive. I look forward to using them for both routine wear and working out when I travel instead of packing an extra pair of workout shoes. The black pair are the first athletic shoes I've been comfortable wearing for "casual" Fridays at the university where I work. The are truly subtle.
customer_reviews.author: Summery

customer_reviews.title: Awesome shoe!!
customer_reviews.text: I wore these out of the box for a week of walking around theme parks in Florida and never got a blister, rub mark or any other issue. I think they run a little small and a little narrow. Maybe a half size to a full size smaller than normal.
customer_reviews.author: HEATHER

customer_reviews.title: Took some major breaking in
customer_reviews.text: Took these on vacation and broke them in....huge mistake. They are so tight and have weird bumps on the inside I could hardly hike. Ordered one size larger and they were still tight.after about a month they fit pretty well. Info says they're treated to keep them from smelling if you go sock less....just wear socks or you'll have stinky feet. Not my favorite shoes I've owned. They do look nice and not clunky like most tennis shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Erin

customer_reviews.title: Still love them!
customer_reviews.text: This is my 2nd pair of these shoes - I wore out my old ones - and I'm delighted that they fit as comfortably as my 1st pair! Some reviewers didn't like the ankle support, but it doesn't bother me at all. For what it's worth, I have rather flat feet and these shoes give my toes plenty of room for natural movement whether I'm walking or running or hiking.
customer_reviews.author: Aunt Bellie

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight, cute, and comfy
customer_reviews.text: I purchased a similar pair of Minimus shoes two years ago and they finally needed replacing. These are excellent shoes for running and walking. They're lightweight, making packing for travel easy. I can wear with or without socks. These ran a bit small, so I had to order a half size up. I hope they never stop making these because they're incredibly light and comfortable!
customer_reviews.author: Observe_the_cat!

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes!
customer_reviews.text: This is my 6th pair of NB Minimus Trail shoes! They fit my feet better than any other running shoes I've ever tried. I love the nice wide toe box - this design is far superior to other shoes in my opinion. Also these feel great right out of the box, every time. Zero blisters and no break-in period needed. I didn't realize I was ordering Wide sizing for this pair until they arrived (my fault) but they fit fine, even though I have more of a narrow foot. I can lace them so they fit perfectly mid-foot, so any extra width is not an issue at all. I really love these shoes.
customer_reviews.author: nannersbananners

customer_reviews.title: Odd fit but works for me
customer_reviews.text: I'm typically on the bigger side of a 7.5 or a small 8. I ordered an 8.5 and the length was perfect. The M width is a bit wide for my narrow foot but the straps across the toe and around the heel are really snug so they kind of cancel out the extra width. Lots of room for the toes which works great for my "finger" toes. The fit is similar to how Keen shoes usually fit me. Comfortable with no socks. Love the look and style. The laces really lock in so I don't anticipate much loosening during activity.
customer_reviews.author: Autumn S.

customer_reviews.title: Returned it for a size 9 wide and it fits great. I was able to run in these and ...
customer_reviews.text: I ordered in my usual running shoes size (8.5 in wide) but it was too small. Returned it for a size 9 wide and it fits great. I was able to run in these and didn't even remembered I had them on because they didn't need any breaking in, fits very comfortably; I just recommend to get it .5 size bigger.
customer_reviews.author: Soleil

customer_reviews.title: Not as wide as used to be
customer_reviews.text: I love NB minimus but these were very different from my old ones. They are more narrow in my opinion and it didn't matter how much I loosened my laces, they were still tight. Not super pleased. I didn't order a wide because my last pair was plenty wide for my big feet (I have large bunions). Still great trail shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Authoress37

customer_reviews.title: Size is tight is probably 1/2 size smaller than my usual size for Minimus shoes
customer_reviews.text: This is my third Minimus pair of shoes. I love the design and feel of the first 2 pairs. I still wear them and get lots of compliments. I like the style and color and was looking forward to wearing this pair of New Balance Women's WT10v1 Minimus Trail Running Shoe. However they very fit tight probably 1⁄2 size smaller when I first wore the shoes. I thought I’d keep wearing these and alternate with my 2 other pairs, hoping they would stretch. But sadly, after a few months, these shoes feel very tight like the first time I wore them. And now I can’t return them because a few months have passed.
customer_reviews.author: gigi carunungan

customer_reviews.title: They fit much smaller than expected and the band around the foot is actually pretty tight. I'm guessing it gets better after you ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought these shoes to try out instead of the Merrell Vapor gloves I usually work out/run in. They fit much smaller than expected and the band around the foot is actually pretty tight. I'm guessing it gets better after you wear it for awhile, but I'm not sure I can stand wearing them long enough to get there. All in all, disappointed. I will be sticking with Merrells from now on.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Evans

customer_reviews.title: Nothing else compares!
customer_reviews.text: This is my fourth pair of these trail running shoes and I absolutely love them! I always buy a full size bigger for long treks/feet swelling and I wouldn't trade them for any other pair of running/trekking shoes! My first pair took me across the Camino de Santiago.
customer_reviews.author: Barstow

customer_reviews.title: My favorite running shoe
customer_reviews.text: This is my 6th pair of Minimus. I replace the standard laces with Lock Laces. I find they flex better with my foot with stretchy laces. Reviewers who find the reinforcement over the forefoot uncomfortable might try this. I like these shoes because they are extremely light and give good road feel. Everything else seems to give me plantar fasciitis, but not these. Although they are marketed as trail shoes, be aware that they don't give much cushioning against large rocks, roots, etc and you might get sore feet on rough trails. Order at least a size up. I wear a 9.5-10 in street shoes and an 11 in these.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly E Collar

customer_reviews.title: Love these shoes
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes, but you need to size up! At least a half size, maybe a full size if you tend to be in between sizes or want to wear cushioned socks. I measure exactly at a 9, and the 9.5 fits well with thin socks on my narrow foot, but still gives me a nice wide toe box for healthy toe spread.
customer_reviews.author: jpaul79

customer_reviews.title: The original is back
customer_reviews.text: Finally!!! I was in love with the early minimus and was disappointed when they change the fit. Each year I would try them again but would end up sending them back. Finally the original fit is back! No uncomfortable rubbing on the top of the foot. The foot bed seems to hit in all the right places again. I’m tempted to buy a couple pairs in case they change them again.
customer_reviews.author: CAE_TX

customer_reviews.title: Rubber band over toe is too tight
customer_reviews.text: Great color- really want to love them, however the band over the toe is too tight. I have a normal width size 9 foot and find the band uncomfortable. Even after several months, it still has not stretched out much. I find myself reaching for my old merrell shoes more than these.
customer_reviews.author: rad22

customer_reviews.title: Sizes run shorter than expected.
customer_reviews.text: Id like to make yet another attempt to order the right size because I like the overall comfort and styling. However, in my experience the sizes seem to run small. I wear size 8 in women's shoes. When the first order arrived, size 8 was too short so I returned the pair and ordered size 8.5.....still too short at the big toe. Soooo....i'm attempting to order it in size 9. Maybe the 3rd time will work.
customer_reviews.author: I. Gros

customer_reviews.title: Good walking shoe
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my daughter-in-law who is a fitness guru. She is very impressed with the minimalist styling of the shoe and feels it is a much better choice that puts less pressure on the body while walking or running :)
customer_reviews.author: my experience

customer_reviews.title: I'm thrilled with this shoe!!!
customer_reviews.text: I work with a nurse that had this shoe on and I loved the look of it. I have a narrow foot and buy narrow New Balances so I was worried but it fits great!!! This is actually a work shoe for me, not hitting the trails. Today is the first day back to work since I bought them but they've been great for the past 4 hours since I put them on. I'm very happy!!!
customer_reviews.author: LaSh

customer_reviews.title: great toe box but that band!
customer_reviews.text: This shoe would've been perfect for me if not for the band of material going across the top of the shoe. I had great toe space and the length of the shoe was perfect. After wearing the shoe for a few moments though, I could feel the pressure from that band. Disappointing to send them back as I loved the shape, color, and roomy toe box. Sadly, going one size up would've been too long for my foot. I'll watch New Balance shoes in the future for a similar designed shoe.
customer_reviews.author: S. Farrow

customer_reviews.title: Cute and light weight.
customer_reviews.text: Love these sneaks because they are light weight and look cute. I'm a true 7 and tend to not wear socks/peds with my sneakers. If you do wear socks or peds and are a true size 7 you may want to order up a half size. I love that New Balance makes SOME of their sneakers in the USA. I would have given this style 5 stars had that been the case for these.
customer_reviews.author: Micki F.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: One of my family members favorite shoe. Exactly as shown and described along with the exact shoe as in store. Can’t go wrong if you already know your size. One happy customer.
customer_reviews.author: Always read reviews 1st

customer_reviews.title: Best shoes. Ever.
customer_reviews.text: I hesitated to buy these because I don't usually spend this much ... I love these shoes!!! I plan to only ever buy this type of athletic shoe now. I did buy 1/2 size up as recommended in other reviews and they fit perfect. I use them for HIIT / boot camp style workouts. Very comfortable and they're very stylish looking.
customer_reviews.author: JLO3279

customer_reviews.title: Fit, feel and construction are great.
customer_reviews.text: These fit and feel amazing! I run in them regularly without issue. I did allow myself a few weeks of wearing them casually before running, but I wear minimal shoes normally, so no adjustment was needed. I love them and get lots of compliments about them!
customer_reviews.author: KarlaBee

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful shoes
customer_reviews.text: I loved the look as soon as I opened the box. I noticed immediately that they were a wider shoe which I was happy with. I put them on and was in heaven. I am a 58 year old body builder and love minimus shoes. I will not be running in these but weight lifting and some cardio. I think they are going to be perfect.
customer_reviews.author: shopper911

customer_reviews.title: It’s love
customer_reviews.text: They are beautiful blue and my fave sneaker ever. This is a repurchase. Last pair lasted 5 years of daily running and i just couldn’t let them go. They are well worn but I kept them & bought a second pair. Love the color better in the new shoes. It’s love.
customer_reviews.author: True Customer

customer_reviews.title: Runs small--very small!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these shoes in the blue/grey. They are super cute and comfortable. But believe the description when it says that they run small. I normally wear a 6-1/2, so I ordered up to a size 7, then a 7-1/2, before finally settling on a size 8. It was worth the trouble. I love them.
customer_reviews.author: Lastu

customer_reviews.title: and loved them. decided to buy this pair as replacements
customer_reviews.text: i bought this style of shoe in this size when it first came out a few years ago, and loved them. decided to buy this pair as replacements, and they seem much more narrow/tighter around the front half of my foot, to the point that after walking a couple miles in them my feet were in pain and i haven't worn them since. there are a couple indications that this particular model has been changed just a bit since it first came out, so i'd recommend trying to find a wide size or going up one half size from what you would normally buy in a NB minimus style.
customer_reviews.author: D Span

customer_reviews.title: Didn't last
customer_reviews.text: I had those for 2 years, used maybe 5 times. look at the picture, it didn't last, started to crack. This is not a good quality shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Hanan Rubin חנן רובין

customer_reviews.title: Great support!
customer_reviews.text: These sneakers are lightweight and still provide a lot of support! I wear them to run on the treadmill all the time! They have stayed in tact for over a year, and they still look good as new!
customer_reviews.author: Anon

customer_reviews.title: Not the best shoe for new balance
customer_reviews.text: Great shoe and speedy for what they are ment for...ended up with tailor bunions and ouch! I love new balance shoes these are not the ones for me.....
customer_reviews.author: Tina

customer_reviews.title: "minimal" shoe with a hard / weird arch support
customer_reviews.text: Wanted to love this but not sure what the heck is going on in the mid-foot area -- it narrows significantly and the inner arch is "supported" by a protrusion that feels really hard, inflexible, and not at all minimal. Returning for sure.
customer_reviews.author: C. chung

customer_reviews.title: Runs small but extremely comfy
customer_reviews.text: Love the minimus and these are my third pair. This particular model of the shoe runs small. I am a true 7 1/2 and had to return first pair ordered and re-order an 8. Would recommend ordering a 1/2 size up. I love the improvements made on the design. Softer all around and insole is super comfy. (I do not wear socks with these) Fancy new tread design and overall comfort level. I will purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Standley

customer_reviews.title: Love these, like walking on the ground
customer_reviews.text: Love these. They are super flat for my super flat feet. The colors are cute. And they make my feet look small.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable shoe, slightly tight in toe box
customer_reviews.text: I have been looking for a good minimalist running shoe and I really like these. I wear a size 7 and ordered 7.5. They fit well, but slightly tight in the toe box. I’d say these sneakers are better for narrow feet.
customer_reviews.author: S. Fishel

customer_reviews.title: Perfect minimal running shoe!
customer_reviews.text: So great, this is my second pair and I love theses! I think these are the best shoes on the market!
customer_reviews.author: Supabee

customer_reviews.title: Terrific, as before.
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a replacement for my older model shoes, which I wore FOREVER, they were so perfect -- just enough protection and support while still being able to feel the surface under your feet. These new versions are awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Sue

customer_reviews.title: Good shoe for work
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are the best. You feel as if you are walking barefoot, but still get the support needed for your feet. I work in a hospital and cover a lot of ground with my walking and these are very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: SoCalShopper

customer_reviews.title: Good, better made than previous. Seems like higher quality.
customer_reviews.text: I have the old version in a size 7 and it was a bit big. I ordered these in a 7.5 and they are smaller but fit. I would say a true 7=7.5 for this product.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Beagles

customer_reviews.title: excellent shoesm
customer_reviews.text: i have flat feet and have been really surprised by the wonderful feel of these shoes. i walk constantly at work and my feet feel great.
customer_reviews.author: lisa

customer_reviews.title: Runs narrow
customer_reviews.text: They run very narrow. My original pair purchased 5 or more years ago were size 9.5 . Now I had to order 9.5 wide.
customer_reviews.author: Hairgurl

customer_reviews.title: Women's needs wider shoes
customer_reviews.text: Great shoe and I am confident I will like it, but even in sizes a little large, the women's shoe is just too narrow. Ordered a pair of the men's in EE.
customer_reviews.author: Sue D

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes - lots of support up top but I ...
customer_reviews.text: Great shoes - lots of support up top but I can feel the trails underneath me. This is my first minimalist shoe and I was pleasantly surprised (expecting to hate the minimalist aspect)
customer_reviews.author: Somer Brown

customer_reviews.title: Very narrow
customer_reviews.text: Very narrow even when I purchased wide width and 1 size up
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Davis

customer_reviews.title: Best. Shoes. Ever.
customer_reviews.text: I stand 12 hours a day for work and these shoes are amazing. They’re the only ones I have been able to wear to work and be comfortable all day. I’ve worn them hiking, at Disney, running around Europe. They’re cute and comfortable. This is literally my 6th pair of these shoes. I will order 10 pairs if they ever decide to discontinue them. I only wish they made more color options!
customer_reviews.author: tbensinger

customer_reviews.title: Favorite sneaker
customer_reviews.text: I really enjoy the fit of these shoes. The wide toe box makes walking and standing very comfortable especially for long periods of time. It's a very close to barefoot/minimalist experience.
customer_reviews.author: Khamil

customer_reviews.title: ... than my last pair of NB wides but still Great, luv the minimalist shoes
customer_reviews.text: Slightly more narrow than my last pair of NB wides but still Great, luv the minimalist shoes. I jog, hike and work as an RN on my feet for 8 hrs in them. 💕 For new minimalist users, break in slowly til ur used to them. My back and knees feel so good in min shoes. Been wearing for 2 years
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: They are light weight and comfortable. My first pair lasted 3 years of vigorous ...
customer_reviews.text: Second pair I’ve bought of these shoes. They are light weight and comfortable. My first pair lasted 3 years of vigorous hiking, swimming, and running. Size fits great I’m a 6.5 bought a 7 and there was a good amount of wiggle room. This time I got 6.5 still a little wiggle but perfect fit!
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Whipple

customer_reviews.title: They fit small in the beginning. Use them a few times before going for a long run.
customer_reviews.text: In the beginning I thought they were too small it after a few runs with them they have stretched to be just perfect. I love my shoes.
customer_reviews.author: María Riojas

customer_reviews.title: Great fit!
customer_reviews.text: Third pair of these I've owned... love them. I use them for weight lifting and it's the next best thing to being barefoot but with some added protection. Very comfortable fit.
customer_reviews.author: DiMic

customer_reviews.title: Love these!
customer_reviews.text: So happy to finally have some wide shoes! I love these shoes. Have been wearing them for crossfit for years... long before all the trendy crossfit shoes were made! Every time someone new sees them they ask what I'm wearing!
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay Ann Foster

customer_reviews.title: May rub slightly
customer_reviews.text: This is my third pair of NB minimus. They are great, lightweight shoes. I will say this version does have extra fabric in the shoe near the pinky toe, which other versions did not have. It rubs slightly on my one foot but not on the other.
customer_reviews.author: _LG

customer_reviews.title: Fit
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to love these shoes, but across the big toe to little toe bone is very uncomfortable. It leaves an indentation. Maybe I needed to size up but since they charge you for returns I didn’t want to take the chance again.
customer_reviews.author: Peggy S. Powers

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: LOVE!!! These truly fixed my foot problem. No more pain!! And yes you can rebuild your flat arches!!!
customer_reviews.author: carolyn

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Poor quality, visible glue all around soles. I ordered two pairs ( black, blue), both the same problem. Returned.
customer_reviews.author: gosia

customer_reviews.title: significantly too small
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this on a sale and it was way smaller than typical sizing. Can't exchange and now the price has doubled. Very dissappointed. Honestly, can't figure out how to contact seller and try to get a price match, so just have to return and not get them.
customer_reviews.author: tara uliasz

customer_reviews.title: Minimalist shoes- very thin sole!
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my wife. The second pair. She uses them as all day shoes in summer. Super comfy! Highly recommended to try before buying- the fit it's unlike common models. I use the same model for running in forest. Only for dry weather and not for beginners!
customer_reviews.author: James Bond

customer_reviews.title: Loved the shoes but they do run small
customer_reviews.text: Loved the shoes but they do run small. I listened to reviews and ordered a half size up. But I have to return them and order a full size up. I did not have a problem with them being narrow like others have said.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is what these shoes look like after 4 months of regular wear
customer_reviews.text: This is what these shoes look like after 4 months of regular wear. These are my favorite running shoes with regard to fit and feel, but the treads wear down in less than a month, and from there it visibly shaves down until it pokes right through. After having to purchase 3 pairs in a year at $100 a pop, I'm done with these and moving on to other brands.
customer_reviews.author: Ben

customer_reviews.title: Great minimal shoe
customer_reviews.text: Great minimal shoe! Best for weightlifting, can run up to three miles in them too. We do a lot of push movements at my gym, sleds, etc and the tread is very durable. I bought my first pair over six years ago and I'm now on pair three. Even with regular exercise they really hold up!
customer_reviews.author: allison deitiker

customer_reviews.title: The best running sneakers I have EVER bought
customer_reviews.text: The best running sneakers I have EVER bought! The color is so cute! Takes a little getting used to being so grounded, but feels amazing!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Michele

customer_reviews.title: Best shoes ever!
customer_reviews.text: It takes a bit to get used to them if you are not used to minimus shoes but they are worth it! I have been wearing th for three years now and will not switch! They are comfy and durable and are great for Capoeira training
customer_reviews.author: Lital R

customer_reviews.title: Size and feeling as you don't wear shoes, minimalistic feeling
customer_reviews.text: It fits a bit small and narrow. I have a pair from 5 years ago which is great. I ordered the same size as stated on my old pair and it is a bit small and narrow. When order add .5 size then width should be ok.
customer_reviews.author: Tatiana Kozlova

customer_reviews.title: Love these shoes
customer_reviews.text: Bough these in size 10; iam usually a size 8.5 but when i read others reviews about it running small, I sized up and It is great. Ive been a fan of Minimus, so happy New Balance brought it back.
customer_reviews.author: Achan

customer_reviews.title: I love these shoes so much
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes so much, this is my 4th or 5th pair of New Balance Minimus shoes...they are the very best!
customer_reviews.author: Juliet Rose

customer_reviews.title: Order a whole size larger if you’re going to wear medium weight socks
customer_reviews.text: Very nice transition shoe for my barefoot training . I have run several miles in them and found them to be very comfortable
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Comfy
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable light weight and good traction I like them
customer_reviews.author: gerobaldi

customer_reviews.title: I also don't like that the fact that the tongue is attached to ...
customer_reviews.text: These run really small. I also don't like that the fact that the tongue is attached to the sides of the shoe and you have to almost wiggle your foot to fit it in.
customer_reviews.author: Breezy

customer_reviews.title: Great fit, comfortable - not long lasting
customer_reviews.text: I love this shoe, however after about 3 months of use it is already wearing faster than any other minimal shoe I've owned, it's not quite through the sole but I can see the end in the near future... super disappointed in that.
customer_reviews.author: Kara

customer_reviews.title: Love these
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this purchase. Fast shipping!! Good quality product. Fit small
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Thank you New Balance!!
customer_reviews.text: I could not be more thrilled with the availability of this shoe. When NB stopped making the minimus running shoes, my running fell way off because nothing else felt good to me. I like to be able to feel the ground beneath me without a brick of sole in between. Long live minimus!!! I could not love these more.
customer_reviews.author: Reader

customer_reviews.title: they're not the best shoes to walk in for a long period of ...
customer_reviews.text: Light weight, breathable, don't rub against the back of my heel. Downfall, they're not the best shoes to walk in for a long period of time.
customer_reviews.author: karlene peter

customer_reviews.title: But I really like the shoe
customer_reviews.text: had to order a size larger than last year when I ordered the same shoe. But I really like the shoe. The low heel is like being barefoot. Good water shoe. They dry fast.
customer_reviews.author: Jan

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: love these shoes, I wear them for work and go through about 1 pair per year!
customer_reviews.author: alisa wray

customer_reviews.title: Runs small in size
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these because I've been eyeballing them for years. Finally bit the bullet and got them. I've been a 10W for as long as I can remember. I'd say the width was okay but the length? No. They fit like a 9. For over $100? Going back.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Order a half size larger
customer_reviews.text: These are great! Very comfortable for a minimalist shoe. I ordered a half size larger than my normal size based on previous reviews. Glad I did, they fit perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: Dee

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this minimus. Disappointed, can't seem to find this style any more.
customer_reviews.author: JA

customer_reviews.title: Best running shoes ever!
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes! When I switched over to shoes with more cushion, about a year and a half ago, I stared having foot problems. I finally switched back to the Minimus and my feet are loving them!
customer_reviews.author: MH

customer_reviews.title: Run walk in comfort
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes. Great for walking on the treadmill, like being barefoot
customer_reviews.author: Paula S. Neal

customer_reviews.title: Love these shoes ❤️
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit! Live these shoes. Great service, they arrived early.
customer_reviews.author: JB Larsen

customer_reviews.title: Really love the fit but I got a blister on the ...
customer_reviews.text: Really love the fit but I got a blister on the back of my ankle area where the shoe hits. Hope the break in time won't be too painful.
customer_reviews.author: AEK

customer_reviews.title: MY FAVORITE RUNNING SHOES!
customer_reviews.text: I can't express enough how much I love these shoes! My last pair lasted me a little bit over 5 years! I'm so excited for this color. Sizes run a tad small so make sure you order half a size bigger then your original size.
customer_reviews.author: Mama Lo

customer_reviews.title: Best running shoe.
customer_reviews.text: I always end up getting NB running shoes because they are the most comfy for me. I need a wide toe box, zero drop. These are great. I go up a half size.
customer_reviews.author: Megan W.

customer_reviews.title: my favorite running shoe
customer_reviews.text: so glad i found my way back to these again! they changed them a couple times and i wasnt a huge fan but this is my 4th pair!
customer_reviews.author: Happy customer

customer_reviews.title: Very good shoes. Perfect buy.
customer_reviews.text: Good grip,size and comfort. Feels like walking barefeet but comfortably. Lives upto its name.
customer_reviews.author: allyoucanbuy

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes!
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are the best, I have nerve entrapment and plantar fasciitis, and these shoes take the pressure off my heel.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: True to Size, Perfect Shoe
customer_reviews.text: I originally purchased one half size up, due to the reviews, but they were 1/2 size too big. Ordered my normal size, and they were PERFECT.
customer_reviews.author: Casey

customer_reviews.title: She is very Pleased with Fit & Quality
customer_reviews.text: My Wife Loves these shoes for Running & Walking ! She is very Pleased with Fit & Quality !
customer_reviews.author: Pablo G.

customer_reviews.title: Great minimal running show
customer_reviews.text: Great minimal running show. Only complained I have is that the back comes up pretty high and I developed some nasty blisters the first time I used them.
customer_reviews.author: Svenja Simon-Marshall

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love my new shoes. Needed a wide. Love how they fit. Very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Roxanne Corzatt

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: I love the look and fit for the most part. However, worked out in them 5 times and the band across the front broke on the left foot. Super bummed.
customer_reviews.author: TDawg

product_meta.title: New Balance Women's WT10v1 Minimus Trail Running Shoe
product_meta.description: Attack the trails with all of the extra tools but none of the extra weight in the minimus trail 10v1. We've brought back the favorite fit and feel of the original model, for unparalleled off-road performance. The new upper material allows for a fresh look at the trail 10, while maintaining the essential forefoot toe splay, and midfoot wrap to hold the foot steady through even the most extreme adventures. Underfoot, the Vibram outsole continues with strategically-placed flex.
feature_bullets: 4 mm drop: due to variances created during the development and manufacturing processes, all references to 4 mm drop are approximate.
Vibram outsole with flex grooves gives stellar traction and durability on rocky trails.
